title: Meanwhile… The Emoticon Turns 40 | Please Don’t Boil Your NyQuil
description:
Meanwhile… Stephen celebrates the world’s first emoticon which was typed out 40 years ago today, and warns of the dangers of cooking with over-the-counter drugs.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
